plot outline: Gujju Rocks revolves around a rich business man, Jayant Kansara, who owns a travel agency. Kansara is married to his childhood sweetheart, Kishori; however, he is hit by the mid-life crisis that has been affecting his personal and professional life. Kansara's employee-turned-friend, Madan Patel, advises him to brighten his mundane life by indulging in to an extra-marital affair with his secretary, Chandani. Kansara's extra-marital affair wasn't a stress buster; rather it turned in to a thrilling roller coaster ride.
title: Gujju Rocks
plot: _Gujju Rocks_ (qv) revolves around a rich business man, Jayant Kansara, who owns a travel agency. Kansara is married to his childhood sweetheart, Kishori; however, he is hit by the mid-life crisis that has been affecting his personal and professional life. Kansara's employee-turned-friend, Madan Patel, advises him to brighten his mundane life by indulging in to an extra-marital affair with his secretary, Chandani. Kansara's extra-marital affair wasn't a stress buster; rather it turned in to a thrilling roller coaster ride.
